Job Title: Communications Manager

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Human Resources, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Salad and Go is a one-of-a-kind drive-thru concept on a mission to make fresh, nutritious food convenient and affordable for ALL. Recipes from our very own Michelin-star trained chef, are prepared in our own central kitchens, delivered directly to our stores where our team members prepare made to order salads, wraps and breakfast burritos for our guests. Our food is offered at a price point that ensures accessibility: everyone deserves a delicious meal. Focused on a simple, convenient drive-thru only model, Salad and Go operates in more than 130 locations across Arizona, Texas, Oklahoma and Nevada and is expanding rapidly into new states. As part of our mission, Salad and Go puts special emphasis on community outreach and philanthropic initiatives and fosters a company culture that prioritizes the wellbeing of all our team members. Our one-of-a-kind model is fundamentally changing food systems and igniting a positive, life-changing movement toward better food for all.
The Communications Manager is a strategic and results-oriented individual who will oversee all internal communications for Salad and Go. This role is responsible for developing, implementing, and managing communication campaigns that effectively promote the company's mission, vision, and values.
As the Manager of Internal Communications for Salad and Go, you will:Bring a creative mindset to communication efforts by exploring innovative ways to engage the target audience and ensure high-impact messaging that aligns with SAG' culture and values. Spearhead the development of a comprehensive listening strategy to gain valuable insights from team members across the organization. Assess where technology, specifically AI, can be most beneficial. Serve as a strategic business partner to field operations leaders to develop and maintain a comprehensive communication strategy for frontline operations, including product launches, promotional campaigns, policy updates, training materials, and other relevant communication materials. Develop firsthand knowledge of our three distinct workforces—store operations, central kitchen operations, and support team members—to understand the best communication mediums for each audience.
During the interview process, we will be particularly interested in hearing about your experience in the following areas, as they are essential for success in this role. Additionally, please come prepared to share samples of your work.
We're excited about you because...You can leverage technology, specifically AI, to enhance already strong writing, editing, and proofreading skills.You have experience communicating with all levels of leadership using a variety of communication media.You have strong organizational skills and demonstrates a bias towards action.You are proficient in using the Microsoft Office suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word, SharePoint, AI), with the ability to create documents and presentations from scratch
BenefitsCompetitive pay + bonus potentialUnlimited PTO (paid time off)Paid sick timeHealth, dental, and vision insurance401k program with company matchGrowth potential with a fast-growing companyFree Salad and Go meals
Consistent with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), Salad and Go will provide reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process when requested by a qualified applicant or employee with a disability, unless such accommodation would cause an undue hardship.
Salad and Go is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
